prompt:
Resume work on @claudedocs/testability-improvements-plan.md. Work incrementally with commits:

**THIS RUN - Complete ONE task only:**
1. Check the plan - find the NEXT uncompleted task
2. Implement ONLY that task (or couple tightly related tasks)
3. Make/update tests for what you changed
4. Run linter and fix any issues (.venv/bin/python3 -m ruff check --fix)
5. Update the plan document with progress (mark task complete)
6. Commit changes with descriptive message
7. DONE - End this run

**Critical:**
- Complete ONLY ONE task per run (not multiple tasks)
- After commit, this run is DONE
- User will manually re-run script for next task
- Each run = one task cycle
- ONLY mark '- [x] everything done' when ALL phases are truly complete

Current completion marker in plan: - [ ] everything done
